Package authoring

Contains the authoring User Interface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioRecorder
    AudioRecorder class This class is intended to be used as a dependency by a client GUI class to record audio from a microphone and save it as a .wav file.
    ColourMapper
    This a utility class is used to create a mapping between location tags in the scenario and their text colour.
    ExportErrorCheck
    Class to handle simple error checking in a scenario file before it is exported Checks for things like missing jump tags, or calling buttons that have not been initialized
    GUI
    This class represents the user interface for the authoring program.
    LeftPanel
    LeftPanel is the abstraction which is used to store the list of commands.
    ReadFile
    Utility class which allows arbitrary files to be played through the speakers.
    RightPanel
    RightPanel is the class responsible for creating the control buttons as well as implementing the simple listeners.
    SettingsPanel
    SettingsPanel is a Panel, added by the GUI class, which contains only the file header information.
    ThreadRunnable
    Utility class which records from a given source to an output file.

Package authoring Description

Contains the authoring User Interface. This package is self-contained except for internal references to commands and listeners, and should be used to launch the program (see GUI class)
